_meanings:
{@--2@} To speak, shout, cry,
roar, (often with words like {#Sabda#},
{#svana, nAda#} &c. as object); {#nanAda#} 
{#balavannAdaM, SabdaM GorataraM nadaMti#} <ls>Mb.</ls>

{@--1@} To
fill with noise, make noisy or 
resonant.

{@--2@} To cause to make a
sound. --WITH {#ud#} to roar, cry
(loudly), bellow (as a bull);  
<ls>Ku. 1. 56.</ls>
